description.value:
Access Side with the Washboard Dogs in the gang conflict.

Requirements You're wielding a melee weapon that deals bludgeoning damage and you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden} from or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Undetected]{Undetected} by an enemy.

You emerge from hiding and deliver a blow that can knock an enemy sprawling to the ground. You Stride up to half your Speed, but you must end your movement next to a foe you're hidden from or undetected by. You then Strike that enemy with the required weapon; if you hit, the target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.
